Welcome to District I
---------------------

![](https://www.cityoflaredo.com/home/showpublishedimage/1480/638116353816470000)
Welcome to the District 1 homepage, where you can find information about past projects and current events happening in our district. Our district is in a rapidly growing part of South Laredo, with new developments springing up every month and many new residents calling this District their home.

To contact your council member, please email, phone, or submit an online message. I welcome your comments and look forward to hearing from you.



District Map
------------

[**District I Map**
![District 1 Map](https://www.cityoflaredo.com/home/showpublishedimage/1478/638116353811000000)](https://www.cityoflaredo.com/home/showpublisheddocument/2898/638116353953030000)

District Demographics & Statistical Data
----------------------------------------



Size of District

11.64 sq. miles

Population

29,874 - From 2010 Census

School Campuses

* Dr. Sigifredo Perez E.S.
* Franklin D. Roosevelt E.S.
* Alicia S. Ruiz
* Octavio Salinas

* Los Obispos M.S.
* Lamar Bruni Vergara

* Lyndon B. Johnson

Watershed

* San Idelfonso Creek (S)

Watershed Map

Fire Stations

Fire Station 14
309 Cielito Lindo
Laredo, TX 78046
(956) 794-1720

Police Sub-Stations

* Beat 16 - 119 Ceniso Loop, Laredo, TX 78046
* Beat 17 - 309 Cielito Lindo, Laredo, TX 78046

Communication Dispatch
956-795-2800

Parks

* George Washington Park - 1100 Nixon
* Century City Park - 120 Century Blvd.

Pools
Recreation Centers

* Lamar Bruni Vergara Boys & Girls Club
